column4: Can anyone recommend a good wireless print server that can serve Windows and Ubuntu, HP and Dell printers?
sorry, i'm not sure of one, but you can get printers with ethernet/wireless built-in for very cheap nowadays
you probably already know, but hp printers seem to work well with ubuntu.  I first got a kodak one and had to return it
are both your computers using ubuntu?  i'm not sure if ubuntu supports printer sharing
i don't know how to share a printer in ubuntu, but it seems like there are some tutorials online: http://www.google.com/search?source=ig&hl=en&q=ubuntu+hp+printer+sharing&btnG=Google+Search
